page.title: 06 WOODMANSEY LIFE
page.content: As Woodmansey only has a shop and a post office, most people do their main shopping in nearby{Beverley}. Larger items, such as furniture, are often obtained in {Hull}. The village has a busy social life with bingo, Red Cross and mother and toddler groups held at the community centre; other groups meet at the church. Regular outings are organised for the older folk. The mobile library visits the village once a fortnight, this being a welcome and well-used service. Of all the people interviewed everyone agreed that they enjoyed living in Woodmansey.
